funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by grants from Wuhan Youth Science and Technology Plan (2016070204010104), China Mega-Project for Infectious Disease (2017ZX10103005-005), Hubei Provincial Natural Science Foundation of China (2016CFC743), Hubei Key Laboratory of Animal Embryo and Molecular Breeding (KLAEMB-2016-06), National Natural Science Foundation of China (31570026), and “One-Three-Five” Research Program of Wuhan Institute of Virology.
